body_html:
@ppwwyyxx @isaprykin Any possibility this feature comes out in TF 2.0?

I heard that the new feature:

Eager execution

    Use DistributionStrategy to utilize multiple GPUs and multiple TPU cores.
    Distributed training support (multi-machine).
    Performance improvements.
    Simpler export to a GraphDef/SavedModel.
body_text:
@ppwwyyxx @isaprykin Any possibility this feature comes out in TF 2.0?
I heard that the new feature:
Eager execution

    Use DistributionStrategy to utilize multiple GPUs and multiple TPU cores.
    Distributed training support (multi-machine).
    Performance improvements.
    Simpler export to a GraphDef/SavedModel.
body:
@ppwwyyxx @isaprykin Any possibility this feature comes out in TF 2.0?

I heard that the new feature:

```
Eager execution

    Use DistributionStrategy to utilize multiple GPUs and multiple TPU cores.
    Distributed training support (multi-machine).
    Performance improvements.
    Simpler export to a GraphDef/SavedModel.
```
